query:
SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.codigo, t.cursos, t.instituicoes, 
       COUNT(DISTINCT f.id) as total_formandos,
       COUNT(DISTINCT e.id) as total_eventos
FROM turmas t
INNER JOIN formandos f ON f.turmaId = t.id
INNER JOIN eventos e ON e.turmaId = t.id AND e.dataEvento IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY t.id
ORDER BY total_formandos DESC
LIMIT 5;
